title: Can anybody identify these Chunky fonts?
author: NeonPurple

comments.content:
Classic: [Sarah Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824123100/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/charlesborges/sarah-script) by Charles Borges de Oliveira  
FANTASY: [Bernhard MTI](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824123100/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/bernhard)  
PIXELDEMON: based on Futura Bold?  
DAILY BULL: probably [Eurostile](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824123100/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/eurostile)  
BLAST: based one Helvetica Neue

"WIZZy": **[Feast of Flesh BB (Italic)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824123100/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=&fid=71ee2df9c928f25a4ce6a5dd5c8d59b7&fsize=48&text=WIZZy&fit=1)** by Nate Piekos [2005]
